caption.p: Structures of M2 in complex with channel blockers. (A) X-ray crystal structure of M2-WT (22–46) in complex with amantadine ( 1) (PDB: 6BKK; Thomaston et al., 2018). (B) Solution NMR structure of M2-S31N (19–49) in complex with ( 4) (PDB: 2LY0 ( Wang et al., 2013a, Wang et al., 2013b);). (C) X-ray crystal structure of M2-V27A (22–46) in complex with spiro-adamantyl amine ( 9) (PDB: 6NV1; Thomaston et al., 2020).
